text: Russell Guy Sullivan (February 19, 1923 – November 2, 2013) was an outfielder in Major League Baseball who played from 1951 to 1953 for the Detroit Tigers. Listed at , , he batted left handed and threw right handed. ==External links== *Baseball Almanac *Baseball Reference – MLB statistics *Baseball Reference – MiLB statistics *Obituary *Retrosheet Category:1923 births Category:2013 deaths Category:Baseball players from Virginia Category:Buffalo Bisons (minor league) players Category:Columbus Jets players Category:Danville Leafs players Category:Detroit Tigers players Category:Little Rock Travelers players Category:Major League Baseball outfielders Category:Sportspeople from Fredericksburg, Virginia Category:Portland Beavers players Category:Toledo Mud Hens players Category:Williamsport Grays players Category:Williamsport Tigers players
